extendedInfo.description: Want to take better pictures?READY for: Droid/Galaxy/Nexus/Hero+more!"All this for free? WOW!"+3 whitebalances+4 filters+35 clipart+21 text fonts+8 hipstamatic effects, more than Instagram+front facing camera support+instamatic brightness/contrast+flash control -if supported+silent no sound mode+focus control, including macro+sharing +draw, paint+ISO control -if supported+EXIF+Import your existing gallery photos+Scene modes -if supported

reviews.title: Not worth the hang ups
reviews.comment: This just doesn t live up to the online reviews. Every time I jibe tried to use it, it freezes up my phone. Don\'t waste your time or space. Not worthy of one star.
reviews.author: Kelly Shiver

reviews.title: Art
reviews.comment: I have the Evo 4 G. And I Love love love IT!!! Five stars all the way ... I use it all the time. Ur picks will  come out looking like art.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I love this app..it has inbuilt some basic editing features..and the most important part i love about is that it takes steady picture even if you shake ur hand..works fine on my lg optimus hub..giving 4 stars only for lacking zoom facility.
